articles.description: With a bullet lodged in his spine, Hisham Awartani phoned his British-born grandmother after Saturday's shooting.
articles.title: 'Granny, I've been shot,' said Palestinian student targeted in Vermont

articles.description: The sleep aid can be used without a prescription in the US and more parents given it to their children.
